idea-plugin.name: Protecteyes Theme
idea-plugin.description:
🌿 Protecteyes Theme - 智能护眼主题 / Eye-Protection Theme

Make coding more comfortable and your eyes more relaxed!

长时间编码，眼睛容易干涩疲劳？
Protecteyes Theme 是一款专为开发者设计的护眼主题插件，融合柔和的色彩科学与舒适的视觉体验，助你高效编码的同时，呵护双眼健康。

Long hours of coding causing eye strain and dryness?
Protecteyes Theme is an eye-protection theme plugin designed specifically for developers. It combines soft color science with comfortable visual experience to help you code efficiently while caring for your eye health.

✨ 主题特点 / Features:

  • 低蓝光柔和配色 / Low Blue Light Soft Colors: 采用经过视觉优化的低饱和度色彩，减少蓝光刺激，缓解长时间注视屏幕的疲劳感。
    Uses visually optimized low-saturation colors to reduce blue light stimulation and alleviate eye fatigue from prolonged screen time.
  • 多层次对比度优化 / Multi-level Contrast Optimization: 关键代码元素清晰突出，非关键信息温和淡化，提升代码可读性而不刺眼。
    Key code elements are clearly highlighted while non-critical information is gently toned down, improving code readability without glare.
  • 全局护眼模式 / Global Eye-Protection Mode: 不仅编辑器，包括侧边栏、工具栏、对话框等整个 IDE 界面都经过统一调色，视觉体验一致舒适。
    Not just the editor, but the entire IDE interface including sidebars, toolbars, and dialogs are uniformly color-tuned for a consistent and comfortable visual experience.
  • 多语言语法高亮支持 / Multi-language Syntax Highlighting Support: 完美适配 Java、Python、JavaScript、HTML/CSS 等主流语言，语法层次分明，逻辑一目了然。
    Perfectly supports mainstream languages like Java, Python, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, with clear syntax hierarchy and logical structure.
  • 暗色/浅色双模式 / Dark/Light Dual Modes: 提供浅色护眼模式，适应不同光线环境与个人偏好。
    Provides light eye-protection mode to adapt to different lighting environments and personal preferences.

🎯 适用人群 / Target Users:

  • 每天长时间编码的职业开发者 / Professional developers who code for long hours daily
  • 学生、自学编程的爱好者 / Students and programming enthusiasts who self-learn
  • 对视觉疲劳敏感或已有干眼症的用户 / Users sensitive to visual fatigue or already suffering from dry eye syndrome
  • 追求高效与健康并重的编程工作者 / Programming professionals who pursue both efficiency and health

🛠 安装与使用 / Installation & Usage:

  1. 在 JetBrains IDE 中进入插件市场（Plugins）
    In JetBrains IDE, go to Plugins Marketplace
  2. 搜索 Protecteyes Theme 并安装
    Search for Protecteyes Theme and install it
  3. 重启 IDE，在 Settings → Appearance & Behavior → Theme 中选择 Protecteyes Theme
    Restart IDE, go to Settings → Appearance & Behavior → Theme and select Protecteyes Theme Light

「我们相信，好的工具不仅要强大，更要人性化。Protecteyes Theme 不只是主题，更是一份对开发者双眼的关怀。」
"We believe that good tools should not only be powerful but also humanized. Protecteyes Theme is more than just a theme—it's a care for developers' eyes."

💡 让 Protecteyes Theme 陪伴你的每一个编程时刻，代码不止于高效，更源于舒适。
Let Protecteyes Theme accompany every moment of your programming. Code is not only about efficiency but also about comfort.
